content: i decided to create a new twist on my happy hammock and use a different stitch pattern and front embellishment i really love how lacy and dainty it looks they are a great way to make use of vertical space especially in small rooms like offices dorm rooms nurseries and rv s supplies needed -approx 120-130 yds of worsted weight size 4 cotton -2 wooden rings size 40 mm optional -13 wooden beads size 10 mm -size h 5 0 mm hook terms used and abbreviations pattern is written in us terminology back loop only - blo beginning - beg chain - chain double_crochet - double_crochet fasten_off - fo front loop only - flo right side - rs single_crochet - single_crochet slip_stitch es - slip_stitch s stitch es - st s space s - space s wrong side - ws gauge 5 row of gauge pattern = 3 5 x 4 5 9 x 11 4 cm finished measurements measurements are taken of rectangle of row 1-18 finished and laying flat 16 x 11 40 6 x 28 cm when made as written with correct gauge gauge is not essential with the use of stitch multiples instructions include the use of wooden rings but also crocheted loops for hanging purposes in the event that wooden rings are not desired this pattern can also be found on my blog at daysck com **there are no refunds for the purchase of my digital patterns my patterns have been tested and edited accordingly however there may still be lingering errors as i am human if you encounter an error please notify me and i will be happy to make the suggested correction and send you the corrected copy if necessary **
